def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils
widget.View.FieldDefinitions["ACOESPROJETOS"].Visible = Utils.EhOrcamentoPublicoComControleAcao() widget.View.FieldDefinitions["ELEMENTODESPESA"].Visible = Utils.EhOrcamentoPublicoComControleAcao()
